alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Rio Blanco (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 3:25PM MDT until July 04 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Garfield County in west central Colorado... Southwestern Rio Blanco County in northwestern Colorado... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 325 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 25 miles south of Rangely, or 45 miles north of Grand Junction, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Garfield and southwestern Rio Blanco Counties. This includes Colorado 139 between mile markers 37 and 58. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
